      Returns:
      true if the name is not in use, false otherwise

      Parameters:
      lobby - the lobby to check.
      clientHandler - the player representation as client handler.
      Returns:
      true if the player is the lobby creator, false otherwise.

      Verify if the numbers of player in a lobby is correct.
      Parameters:
      lobby - the lobby to verify
      Returns:
      true if the number of player is correct to start a game, false otherwise.

    • getPublicLobbiesDTO

      public List<LobbyExtendedDTO> getPublicLobbiesDTO()
      Get all the public lobbies that are not playing.
      Returns:
      the list of the public lobbies in which the player can enter

    • addNewLobby

      public Pair<String,Optional<Integer>> addNewLobby(LobbyDTO lobbyDTO, ClientHandler creatorPlayer)
      add a new lobby.
      Parameters:
      lobbyDTO - the base information to create a lobby
      creatorPlayer - the creator of the lobby
      Returns:
      a Pair composed by the message to return to the client and an Optional representing the code to access the lobby if it is private
      Throws:
      PlayerAlreadyInLobbyException - if the player which is trying to create the lobby is already in another lobby
      LobbyNameAlreadyExistsException - if the lobby name is already taken
      IllegalNameFormatException - if the name of the lobby or the player doesn't respect the constraint

    • joinLobby

      public Pair<Set<String>,Optional<String>> joinLobby(LobbyExtendedDTO lobbyDTO, String player, Optional<Integer> code, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Permits the player to enter an existing lobby.
      Parameters:
      lobbyDTO - the lobby to enter in DTO form.
      player - the player name in the lobby.
      code - the code to access private lobbies.
      clientHandler - the player as client handler.
      Returns:
      the players in the lobby and the creator player of the lobby.
      Throws:
      PlayerAlreadyInLobbyException - if the player already is in a lobby.
      LobbyNotExistsException - if the lobby does not exist.
      NoCodeForPrivateLobbyException - if it is a private lobby and the code is not provided.
      WrongAccessCodeException - if it is a private lobby and the code is wrong.
      PlayerNameAlreadyTakenException - if there is already a player with this name in the lobby.
      IllegalNumberOfPlayerInLobbyException - if the number of players in the lobby exceed max amount.
      GameAlreadyStartedException - if the game is already started in the lobby.
      IllegalNameFormatException - if the name of the player doesn't respect the constraint

    • getDTOFromName

      public LobbyExtendedDTO getDTOFromName(String name)
      Used for joining to a lobby.
      Parameters:
      name - the lobby name.
      Returns:
      the lobby in extended DTO form.
      Throws:
      LobbyNotExistsException - if the name does not mach any lobby.

    • startGame

      public ClientGameManager startGame(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Start the game.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the player as client handler.
      Returns:
      the initial game state.
      Throws:
      PlayerIsNotLobbyCreatorException - if the player is not the lobby creator.
      GameAlreadyStartedException - if the game has already started.
      IllegalNumberOfPlayerInLobbyException - if the number of players in the lobby is not between 2 and 4.
      IllegalArgumentException - from Lobby.startGame()

      public ClientGameManager drawCards(ClientHandler clientHandler, RowColumnIdentifier line)
      Draw a line of cards from the matrix.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the player as client handler.
      line - the line of cards to draw.
      Returns:
      the current game state.
      Throws:

      UnknownCardException - from ServerGameManager.drawCards(org.catlady.server.game.matrix.RowColumnIdentifier)
      PlayerNotInLobbyException - if the player is not part of a lobby
      NotPlayerTurnException - when a game action is made during another player turn

    • endCurrentTurn

      public ClientGameManager endCurrentTurn(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      End current player turn.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the player as client handler.
      Returns:
      the state of the game.
      Throws:

    • addPlayerCats

      public Map<String,PointCategory> addPlayerCats(ClientHandler clientHandler, List<CatCard> cats)
      Evaluate the cats sent form the players, validate them according to the server game state, and use them to calculate player points.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the player as client handler.
      cats - the card cats sent from the client.
      Throws:
      PlayerNotInLobbyException - if the player is not part of a lobby
      IllegalPlayException - if player passed cats or food not owned or not existing
      NotEndGameException - if it is not the end game

    • getPlayerLobby

      public Lobby getPlayerLobby(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      get the lobby of a player specified by its handler.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the player as client handler.
      Returns:
      the lobby in which the player is.
      Throws:
      PlayerNotInLobbyException - if the player is not part of any lobby.
